10000000voltthunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
10000000voltthunderbolt.description: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

acidarmor.name: Acid Armor
acidarmor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

aciddownpour.name: Acid Downpour
aciddownpour.description: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

acidspray.name: Acid Spray
acidspray.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

aerialace.name: Aerial Ace
aerialace.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

afteryou.name: After You
afteryou.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

aircutter.name: Air Cutter
aircutter.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

airslash.name: Air Slash
airslash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

alloutpummeling.name: All-Out Pummeling
alloutpummeling.description: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

allyswitch.name: Ally Switch
allyswitch.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

anchorshot.name: Anchor Shot
anchorshot.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

aquajet.name: Aqua Jet
aquajet.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

aquaring.name: Aqua Ring
aquaring.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

aquatail.name: Aqua Tail
aquatail.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

armthrust.name: Arm Thrust
armthrust.description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.

aromaticmist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromaticmist.description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by ally Pokémon.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

attackorder.name: Attack Order
attackorder.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

attract.name: Attract
attract.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

aurorabeam.name: Aurora Beam
aurorabeam.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

auroraveil.name: Aurora Veil
auroraveil.description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

babydolleyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
babydolleyes.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

banefulbunker.name: Baneful Bunker
banefulbunker.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

beakblast.name: Beak Blast
beakblast.description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

belch.name: Belch
belch.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

blackholeeclipse.name: Black Hole Eclipse
blackholeeclipse.description: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

blastburn.name: Blast Burn
blastburn.description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can’t move on the next turn.

blazekick.name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

block.name: Block
block.description: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

bloomdoom.name: Bloom Doom
bloomdoom.description: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

blueflare.name: Blue Flare
blueflare.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

boltstrike.name: Bolt Strike
boltstrike.description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

boneclub.name: Bone Club
boneclub.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bravebird.name: Brave Bird
bravebird.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

breakneckblitz.name: Breakneck Blitz
breakneckblitz.description: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

brickbreak.name: Brick Break
brickbreak.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

brine.name: Brine
brine.description: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

brutalswing.name: Brutal Swing
brutalswing.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

bubblebeam.name: Bubble Beam
bubblebeam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

bugbite.name: Bug Bite
bugbite.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz
bugbuzz.description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

bulkup.name: Bulk Up
bulkup.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

bulletpunch.name: Bullet Punch
bulletpunch.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed
bulletseed.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

burnup.name: Burn Up
burnup.description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

calmmind.name: Calm Mind
calmmind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

catastropika.name: Catastropika
catastropika.description: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

celebrate.name: Celebrate
celebrate.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

chargebeam.name: Charge Beam
chargebeam.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

chipaway.name: Chip Away
chipaway.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

circlethrow.name: Circle Throw
circlethrow.description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

clangingscales.name: Clanging Scales
clangingscales.description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

clearsmog.name: Clear Smog
clearsmog.description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

coil.name: Coil
coil.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

cometpunch.name: Comet Punch
cometpunch.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

confide.name: Confide
confide.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s  Speed stat.

continentalcrush.name: Continental Crush
continentalcrush.description: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

coreenforcer.name: Core Enforcer
coreenforcer.description: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

corkscrewcrash.name: Corkscrew Crash
corkscrewcrash.description: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

cottonguard.name: Cotton Guard
cottonguard.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user’s Defense stat.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target’s held item.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

craftyshield.name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

crosspoison.name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

crushgrip.name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

cut.name: Cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

darkestlariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkestlariat.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

darkvoid.name: Dark Void
darkvoid.description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

dazzlinggleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlinggleam.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

defendorder.name: Defend Order
defendorder.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

defensecurl.name: Defense Curl
defensecurl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

defog.name: Defog
defog.description: A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target’s evasiveness.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.description: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

devastatingdrake.name: Devastating Drake
devastatingdrake.description: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

diamondstorm.name: Diamond Storm
diamondstorm.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user’s Defense stat.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

disarmingvoice.name: Disarming Voice
disarmingvoice.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzypunch.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

doomdesire.name: Doom Desire
doomdesire.description: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

doubleedge.name: Double-Edge
doubleedge.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

doublehit.name: Double Hit
doublehit.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

doubleslap.name: Double Slap
doubleslap.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

doubleteam.name: Double Team
doubleteam.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragonclaw.name: Dragon Claw
dragonclaw.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

dragonhammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragonhammer.description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

dragonpulse.name: Dragon Pulse
dragonpulse.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

dragonrage.name: Dragon Rage
dragonrage.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush
dragonrush.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.description: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

drillpeck.name: Drill Peck
drillpeck.description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

drillrun.name: Drill Run
drillrun.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

dualchop.name: Dual Chop
dualchop.description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target’s  Sp. Def stat.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.description: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

eggbomb.name: Egg Bomb
eggbomb.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.

electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.description: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.description: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description: This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

energyball.name: Energy Ball
energyball.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extremeevoboost.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.

extremespeed.name: Extreme Speed
extremespeed.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

facade.name: Facade
facade.description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

fairywind.name: Fairy Wind
fairywind.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

featherdance.name: Feather Dance
featherdance.description: The user covers the target’s body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

fierydance.name: Fiery Dance
fierydance.description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

finalgambit.name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

fireblast.name: Fire Blast
fireblast.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

firelash.name: Fire Lash
firelash.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

firepledge.name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.description: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move’s power.

flameburst.name: Flame Burst
flameburst.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target’s accuracy.

flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleurcannon.description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

fling.name: Fling
fling.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item.

floralhealing.name: Floral Healing
floralhealing.description: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.description: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

flyingpress.name: Flying Press
flyingpress.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s  Sp. Def stat.

focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

followme.name: Follow Me
followme.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

forcepalm.name: Force Palm
forcepalm.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

forestscurse.name: Forest’s Curse
forestscurse.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.description: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.

freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

freezeshock.name: Freeze Shock
freezeshock.description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzyplant.description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

frostbreath.name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.description: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

furyattack.name: Fury Attack
furyattack.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.description: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.

fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.description: The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

geargrind.name: Gear Grind
geargrind.description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

gearup.name: Gear Up
gearup.description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

genesissupernova.name: Genesis Supernova
genesissupernova.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact
gigaimpact.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

gigavolthavoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc
gigavolthavoc.description: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

glare.name: Glare
glare.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.description: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle
grasswhistle.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description: Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Flying moves can’t be used.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola
guardianofalola.description: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

guardsplit.name: Guard Split
guardsplit.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

guardswap.name: Guard Swap
guardswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot
gunkshot.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm
hammerarm.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

happyhour.name: Happy Hour
happyhour.description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

headcharge.name: Head Charge
headcharge.description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

headsmash.name: Head Smash
headsmash.description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

healorder.name: Heal Order
healorder.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp
heartstamp.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

heartswap.name: Heart Swap
heartswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

heatwave.name: Heat Wave
heatwave.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

highhorsepower.name: High Horsepower
highhorsepower.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

holdback.name: Hold Back
holdback.description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

honeclaws.name: Hone Claws
honeclaws.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

hornattack.name: Horn Attack
hornattack.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

horndrill.name: Horn Drill
horndrill.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.description: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydrocannon.description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t move on the next turn.

hydropump.name: Hydro Pump
hydropump.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

hydrovortex.name: Hydro Vortex
hydrovortex.description: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.

hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang
hyperfang.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspacehole.description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.description: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move’s power increases each time it hits.

icebeam.name: Ice Beam
icebeam.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

iceburn.name: Ice Burn
iceburn.description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

icefang.name: Ice Fang
icefang.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

icehammer.name: Ice Hammer
icehammer.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

icepunch.name: Ice Punch
icepunch.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

iceshard.name: Ice Shard
iceshard.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash
iciclecrash.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear
iciclespear.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

infernooverdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive
infernooverdrive.description: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it’s rooted, it can’t switch out.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.description: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

irondefense.name: Iron Defense
irondefense.description: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

ironhead.name: Iron Head
ironhead.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.description: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

jumpkick.name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

kingsshield.name: King’s Shield
kingsshield.description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.description: The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that item can’t be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

landswrath.name: Land’s Wrath
landswrath.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
laserfocus.description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

lastresort.name: Last Resort
lastresort.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

lavaplume.name: Lava Plume
lavaplume.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

leafage.name: Leafage
leafage.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

leafblade.name: Leaf Blade
leafblade.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

leaftornado.name: Leaf Tornado
leaftornado.description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

leechlife.name: Leech Life
leechlife.description: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

lick.name: Lick
lick.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin
lightofruin.description: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

lightscreen.name: Light Screen
lightscreen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovelykiss.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.description: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

luckychant.name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.

lunardance.name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge
lusterpurge.description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

machpunch.name: Mach Punch
machpunch.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf
magicalleaf.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

magiccoat.name: Magic Coat
magiccoat.description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

magicroom.name: Magic Room
magicroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.

magmastorm.name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnetbomb.description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

magneticflux.name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.description: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

maliciousmoonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault
maliciousmoonsault.description: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

matblock.name: Mat Block
matblock.description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

meanlook.name: Mean Look
meanlook.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.description: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn’t used first.

megadrain.name: Mega Drain
megadrain.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

megahorn.name: Megahorn
megahorn.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

megakick.name: Mega Kick
megakick.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

megapunch.name: Mega Punch
megapunch.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.description: The user senses the target’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye
miracleeye.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

mirrormove.name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target’s last move.

mirrorshot.name: Mirror Shot
mirrorshot.description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

mistball.name: Mist Ball
mistball.description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moongeistbeam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeistbeam.description: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

mudbomb.name: Mud Bomb
mudbomb.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.description: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

mudsport.name: Mud Sport
mudsport.description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

multiattack.name: Multi-Attack
multiattack.description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot
nastyplot.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type and power.

naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.description: This attack makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

naturesmadness.name: Nature’s Madness
naturesmadness.description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

needlearm.name: Needle Arm
needlearm.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

neverendingnightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
neverendingnightmare.description: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

nightdaze.name: Night Daze
nightdaze.description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

nightslash.name: Night Slash
nightslash.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

nobleroar.name: Noble Roar
nobleroar.description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.description: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

oceanicoperetta.name: Oceanic Operetta
oceanicoperetta.description: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

originpulse.name: Origin Pulse
originpulse.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.description: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

payback.name: Payback
payback.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.

payday.name: Pay Day
payday.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

peck.name: Peck
peck.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

phantomforce.name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

pinmissile.name: Pin Missile
pinmissile.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

playnice.name: Play Nice
playnice.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

poisongas.name: Poison Gas
poisongas.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those hit.

poisonjab.name: Poison Jab
poisonjab.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

poisonpowder.name: Poison Powder
poisonpowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff
pollenpuff.description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

pound.name: Pound
pound.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

powder.name: Powder
powder.description: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

powergem.name: Power Gem
powergem.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

powersplit.name: Power Split
powersplit.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

powerswap.name: Power Swap
powerswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

powerwhip.name: Power Whip
powerwhip.description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the  like to harshly lash the target.

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

present.name: Present
present.description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismaticlaser.description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychicterrain.description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

psychocut.name: Psycho Cut
psychocut.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

pulverizingpancake.name: Pulverizing Pancake
pulverizingpancake.description: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move’s power.

purify.name: Purify
purify.description: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used on a target that’s switching out of battle.

quash.name: Quash
quash.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

quickattack.name: Quick Attack
quickattack.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

quiverdance.name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

razorshell.name: Razor Shell
razorshell.description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.description: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

reflecttype.name: Reflect Type
reflecttype.description: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

relicsong.name: Relic Song
relicsong.description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.

return.name: Return
return.description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

roaroftime.name: Roar of Time
roaroftime.description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

rockclimb.name: Rock Climb
rockclimb.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

rockpolish.name: Rock Polish
rockpolish.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

rockthrow.name: Rock Throw
rockthrow.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rockwrecker.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can’t move on the next turn.

roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target’s natural Ability.

rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick
rollingkick.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

roost.name: Roost
roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

round.name: Round
round.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

sandattack.name: Sand Attack
sandattack.description: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

savagespinout.name: Savage Spin-Out
savagespinout.description: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

scald.name: Scald
scald.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s Defense stat.

searingshot.name: Searing Shot
searingshot.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.description: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

seedbomb.name: Seed Bomb
seedbomb.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone
shadowbone.description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw
shadowclaw.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch
shadowpunch.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

shadowsneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadowsneak.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: The user makes its edges more jagged,  which raises its Attack stat.

shatteredpsyche.name: Shattered Psyche
shatteredpsyche.description: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.description: The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
