shiftgear.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

silverwind.name: Silver Wind
silverwind.description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

simplebeam.name: Simple Beam
simplebeam.description: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

sinisterarrowraid.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
sinisterarrowraid.description: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

slam.name: Slam
slam.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

sleeppowder.name: Sleep Powder
sleeppowder.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

sludgewave.name: Sludge Wave
sludgewave.description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

smackdown.name: Smack Down
smackdown.description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

smartstrike.name: Smart Strike
smartstrike.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.description: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.

smog.name: Smog
smog.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.description: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

snore.name: Snore
snore.description: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

soak.name: Soak
soak.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom
sonicboom.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

soulstealing7starstrike.name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
soulstealing7starstrike.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend
spacialrend.description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

spark.name: Spark
spark.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief
spectralthief.description: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

speedswap.name: Speed Swap
speedswap.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon
spikecannon.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team’s feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move’s power.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

spore.name: Spore
spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

steameruption.name: Steam Eruption
steameruption.description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.description: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

stokedsparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
stokedsparksurfer.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

stoneedge.name: Stone Edge
stoneedge.description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

stormthrow.name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

stringshot.name: String Shot
stringshot.description: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

strugglebug.name: Struggle Bug
strugglebug.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

stunspore.name: Stun Spore
stunspore.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

submission.name: Submission
submission.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

subzeroslammer.name: Subzero Slammer
subzeroslammer.description: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteelstrike.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

supersonicskystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
supersonicskystrike.description: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

surf.name: Surf
surf.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent
sweetscent.description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

swordsdance.name: Swords Dance
swordsdance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

takedown.name: Take Down
takedown.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

tectonicrage.name: Tectonic Rage
tectonicrage.description: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance
teeterdance.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.

thousandarrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

thousandwaves.name: Thousand Waves
thousandwaves.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.description: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderfang.name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

thunderpunch.name: Thunder Punch
thunderpunch.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thundershock.name: Thunder Shock
thundershock.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderwave.name: Thunder Wave
thunderwave.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

topsyturvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsyturvy.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

torment.name: Torment
torment.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

toxicthread.name: Toxic Thread
toxicthread.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

triattack.name: Tri Attack
triattack.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

trick.name: Trick
trick.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

trickortreat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trickortreat.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

tropkick.name: Trop Kick
tropkick.description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

trumpcard.name: Trump Card
trumpcard.description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

twinkletackle.name: Twinkle Tackle
twinkletackle.description: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

twister.name: Twister
twister.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

vacuumwave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuumwave.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

vcreate.name: V-create
vcreate.description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

venomdrench.name: Venom Drench
venomdrench.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

vicegrip.name: Vice Grip
vicegrip.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

vinewhip.name: Vine Whip
vinewhip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

wakeupslap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wakeupslap.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

waterfall.name: Waterfall
waterfall.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

watergun.name: Water Gun
watergun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

waterpledge.name: Water Pledge
waterpledge.description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.

waterpulse.name: Water Pulse
waterpulse.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

watershuriken.name: Water Shuriken
watershuriken.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

watersport.name: Water Sport
watersport.description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

waterspout.name: Water Spout
waterspout.description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.description: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

wideguard.name: Wide Guard
wideguard.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

wildcharge.name: Wild Charge
wildcharge.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

willowisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
willowisp.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

wingattack.name: Wing Attack
wingattack.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s max HP.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

wonderroom.name: Wonder Room
wonderroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer
woodhammer.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

workup.name: Work Up
workup.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

worryseed.name: Worry Seed
worryseed.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and  squeeze the target for four to five turns.

wringout.name: Wring Out
wringout.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move’s power.

xscissor.name: X-Scissor
xscissor.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

zenheadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zenheadbutt.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

zingzap.name: Zing Zap
zingzap.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
